genword.title: Samar da Kalmomi
genword.desc: Yana samar da kalmomi dangane da bayanan da ka shigar.
genword.placeholder: Ba a samar da kalmomi ba tukunna.
genword.constraints_ph: Shigar da kandami (misali: tsarin CV, sauti da aka amince da su)
genword.vibe_ph: Shigar da yanayin da kake so (misali: 'na da', 'na zamani')
defaults.author: Marubuci
defaults.grammar: Dokoki\n// Shigar da dokokin nahawunka a nan...
wizard.overwrite_confirm: Shin kana da tabbacin kana son fara sabuwar project? Wannan zai goge yanayin da ake ciki yanzu.
source.title: Madogara Ta Project
source.desc: Duba kuma gyara danyen bayanan JSON na project.
source.warning: Gargaɗi: Gyara kai tsaye na iya haifar da lalacewar bayanai.
val.desc: Saita dokokin tabbatarwa da tsara kamunka.
lbl.allow_duplicates_desc: Bada damar shigarwa da yawa don kalma daya.
lbl.case_sensitive_desc: Dauki 'a' da 'A' a matsayin haruffa daban-daban yayin tabbatarwa.
lbl.allowed_chars: Haruffa da aka amince da su (Regex)
lbl.allowed_chars_desc: Kalmomin da suka dace da wannan Regex ne kawai za a dauke su a matsayin ingantattu. Misali: a-zA-Z
val.no_bans: Ba a saita jerin haruffa da aka hana ba.
lbl.structure_desc: Ayyanar da tsarin gajeren sauti (syllable) ko kalma da aka yarda da shi. Yi amfani da C don konsonanti da V don wasali. Misali: C?VC?V
sort.custom_order_desc: Shigar da haruffa dangane da tsarin haruffan da kake so don tsarin tsara bayani na gaba (misali: a,b,c,aa,ab,...).
settings.title: Saituna
grammar.title: Editan Nahawu
grammar.desc: Ayyanar da dokokin nahawu da tsarin harshenka.
grammar.bnf_placeholder: // Shigar da dokokin nahawunka a nan...
grammar.type_sentence: Shigar da jimla don yin nazari...
common.confirm: Shin kana da tabbacin kana son goge wannan abu?
grammar.no_morph_rules: Ba a ayyanar da dokokin tsarin kalmomi ba tukunna. Kara wasu don fara!
dashboard.manage_lexicon_desc: Kara, gyara, da tsara kalmomi a cikin kamus.
dashboard.define_grammar_desc: Gina dokokin sintaksi da ke tafiyar da harshenka.
app.title: Korelang
app.subtitle: Babban kayan aiki ga masu kirkirar harshe
val.invalid_char: An sami harafin da ba a amince da shi ba
val.must_start: Kalma ba ta fara da jerin haruffan da ake bukata ba.
val.must_end: Kalma ba ta kare da jerin haruffan da ake bukata ba.
val.structure_fail: Kalma ta saba wa tsarin sauti
lexicon.ai_requires_key: Samar da kalmomi ta AI yana bukatar API key.
lexicon.no_matches: Ba a sami sakamakon da ya dace ba.
lexicon.try_adjust: Da fatan za a gwada daidaita nemanka ko tace bayani.
integrity.title: Cire alakar shigarwa
integrity.warning: Wannan kalmar ita ce tushen sauran kalmomi a cikin kamunka. Cire alaka zai katse wannan dangantakar.
integrity.desc: Idan ka ci gaba, ba za a sake gane wannan kalma a matsayin tushe ba kuma sauran kalmomin da aka samo daga gare ta za su rasa alakar su ta 'An samo shi daga'. Wannan matakin ba za a iya soke shi ba.
lexicon.delete_confirm_desc: Shin kana da tabbacin kana son goge kalmar
lexicon.action_cannot_undo: Wannan matakin ba za a iya soke shi ba.
phonology.ai_disabled_desc: Da fatan za a saita API key dinka a saituna don kunna ayyukan AI.
phonology.unclassified_consonants: Konsonanti da ba a rarraba ba (ta hanyar AI)
phonology.unclassified_vowels: Wasula da ba a rarraba ba (ta hanyar AI)
wizard.create_desc: Fara sabuwar project na harshen kirkira (conlang).
wizard.name: Sunan Project
wizard.author: Marubuci
wizard.optional: Ba dole ba ne, za a iya saita shi daga baya.
console.refactor_complete: An kammala sake fasalin tsarin da hadewa.
console.no_violations: Kamusi ya bi dokokin tsarin sauti na yanzu.
console.help_fix: Gyara kalmomin da suka saba wa dokokin project.
genevolve.commit_alert: An aiwatar da canje-canje a cikin kamusi!
genevolve.title: Asali & Ci gaba
genevolve.desc: Aiwatar da canjin sauti a cikin kamunka ka ga yadda kalmomi ke sauyawa.
genevolve.placeholder: Gudanar da canjin sauti a nan don ganin ci gaba.
settings.api_key_ph: Shigar da Gemini API Key dinka
settings.api_key_required: Ana bukatar API key don ayyukan AI.
settings.help_subtitle: Bi wadannan matakan don kirkira da saita Gemini API key dinka.
settings.help_step_1: 1. Ziyarci Google AI Studio don kirkirar API key dinka (kana bukatar asusun Google)
settings.help_step_2: 2. Danna 'Get API Key in a new project' ko 'Create API Key in an existing project'.
settings.help_step_3: 3. Kwafi API key da aka samar.
settings.help_step_4: 4. Likawa API key din a cikin akwatin shigarwa a sama.
settings.help_step_5: 5. Danna 'Kammala Saitawa' don adana key din.
settings.help_free_desc: Eh, amfani da Gemini API na kyauta ne. Duba takardun Google don karin bayani.
whats_new.title: Abin da ke sabo a cikin v1.1.1
whats_new.f1_desc: Duk harsuna 46 yanzu an fassara su sosai kuma an tsara su gaba ɗaya.
constraints.script_config_missing: Ba a saka tsarin rubutu ba.
settings.cognitive_ai_desc: Kunna injin neva don ilimin harshe.
notebook.title: Littafin Rubutu Na Gwaji
notebook.subtitle: An kunna ma'aunin gani don nazarin rubutu dalla-dalla.
notebook.switch_prompt: Koma yanayin rubutu don ganin alamunka
phonology.replace_warning: Da fatan za a duba sauti a sama. Idan ka aiwatar da wannan, za a **sauya** tsarukan sauti na yanzu.
phonology.replace_confirm: Wannan zai sauya tsarukan sautinka na yanzu. Shin kana da tabbacin?
phonology.clear_confirm: Shin kana da tabbacin kana son goge dukkan sauti?
phonology.generation_failed: Samar da AI ya gaza. Da fatan za a duba API key dinka.
console.ai_failed_no_key: Dokan AI ta gaza: Ba a saita API key ba.
console.configure_key_msg: Da fatan za a saita API key dinka a zaben studio don kunna ayyukan AI.
console.configure_key_step: Je zuwa Zabe (Saituna) > Gaba daya, sannan ka shigar da Gemini API Key dinka.
console.ai_applied: An yi amfani da AI: an sauya kalmomi {{count}}.
console.processing_error: An sami kuskure yayin gudanar da dokan AI.
console.unknown_command: KoreLang bai gane wannan doka ba.
console.proposals_review: An samar da shawarwari. Da fatan za a duba teburin:
console.ai_applied_count: An yi amfani da AI: an sauya kalmomi {{count}}.
lexicon.etymology_placeholder: misali: An aro shi daga High Valyrian...
lexicon.regex_error: Kandami yana dauke da Regex mara kyau
val.custom_sort_placeholder: a b c d e f g...
grammar.rules_loaded: COUNT_Dokokin masu kula da wuri An ɗora
grammar.sandbox_desc: Rubuta jumla don ganin yadda nahawu da morphology ke hulɗa.
